attributes.action: have greater control over the estimated 1600 terrorist suspects living in britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are around 1600 suspect terrorists living in britain. Why should they be here living on our benefits, our kindness and our free land when all they want to do is to destroy it! Please sign this petition to show the goverment that we want new laws to deal with these people so they are no longer a threat!
